data.chText: （尤指因生活好而）满意的，惬意的，满足的
data.enText: showing or feeling happiness or satisfaction, especially because your life is good

data.chText: 惬意的微笑
他是个心满意足的人。
她心满意足地笑了。

data.text: happy ♦ satisfied ♦ content ♦ contented ♦ joyful ♦ blissful

data.chText: 以上各词均表示快乐、愉快、满意。
data.enText: These words all describe feeling, showing or giving pleasure or satisfaction.

data.chText: 指快乐的、满意的、放心的：
data.enText: feeling, showing or giving pleasure; satisfied with sth or not worried about it

data.chText: 幸福的婚姻 / 回忆 / 童年
我说过我要去只是为了让他高兴。
data.enText: I said I'd go, just to keep him happy .

data.chText: 指满意的、满足的、欣慰的：
data.enText: pleased because you have achieved sth or because sth has happened as you wanted it to; showing this satisfaction

data.chText: 她对自己所得到的从不感到满足。
data.enText: She's never satisfied with what she's got.

data.chText: 满意的微笑
指满意、满足：
data.enText: [not before noun] happy and satisfied with what you have

data.chText: 我在阳光下躺着就感到非常满足。
data.enText: I'm perfectly content just to lie in the sun.

data.chText: 指满意的、满足的、惬意的：
data.enText: happy and comfortable with what you have; showing this

data.chText: 心满意足的小宝贝
惬意的长叹
用content还是contented？
contented多指因生活舒适而惬意；content多指对生活的态度，可以用have to be content（只好知足）或learn to be content（学会知足）。人和动物均可用contented，但只有人才能用content。
data.enText: Being contented depends more on having a comfortable life; being content can depend more on your attitude to your life: you can have to be content or learn to be content . People or animals can be contented but only people can be content .

data.chText: 指高兴的、快乐的、令人愉快的
data.enText: ( rather formal ) very happy; making people very happy

data.chText: 指令人愉快的、极乐的、幸福的：
data.enText: making people very happy; showing this happiness

data.chText: 无忧无虑的三周假期
用joyful还是blissful？
joy较活跃和富有活力，bliss则较平和。
data.enText: Joy is a livelier feeling; bliss is more peaceful.

means: (尤指因生活好而)满意的，惬意的，满足的

tr: satisfied or showing satisfaction with things as they are

value.def: If you are contented, you are satisfied with your life or the situation you are in.

example.ex: Whenever he returns to this place he is happy and contented...
example.tran: 每次回到这个地方，他都十分快乐，心满意足。

example.ex: She was gazing at him with a soft, contented smile on her face.
example.tran: 她注视着他，脸上带着温柔而满足的微笑。
房东太太心满意足地叹了口气。
